<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/getStatus/{ver}/{lang}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the current status of lien marking for a specific land parcel.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
